授業方法:
For the Fall semester 2021, this course will be held face to face, but may include some ONLINE content in both simultaneous two-way or on-demand format.

< For students permitted to take classes online > - On-demand broadcast of data recorded from face-to-face classes via Google Classroom. Students need to check LUNA for more details on accessing Google Classroom

Thus, students will NEED access to a computer at home (not just a smartphone) or a KGU computer lab to be able to properly complete and submit assignments. Desktop, laptop, notebook, Macbook, etc, are fine. Students should also have a Google account and sign up for Google Drive and Google Classroom (both are for free). To access the online materials, the teacher will provide the class code at a later date.
~~~~~~~~~~~
This is an all-English classroom. Students can expect to communicate with the teacher and other students in English only.

Additionally, this class is taught communicatively and the class functions as a community in which all members support each other. This means that students can expect to interact regularly through pair work or small groups to review course content and/or will have consistent interaction with the teacher.
